title: Signage Stroll
content: Starts around [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20120730194304/http:/flickr.com/photos/lasquetipress/2277670286/), scroll through the photostream, if you dare....
author: Linda Cunningham

comments.content: I can never decide if missed out by not playing hockey as a child or am lucky to have never experienced temperatures below ten degrees.
